New Zealand Herald https://www.nzherald.co.nz New Zealand Herald News Feed 2024 年 2 月 11 日星期日 08:09:41 +0000 zh 1每小时1
Police suspend search for 37-year-old Piha swimmer missing after ‘getting into difficulty’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-suspend-search-for-37-year-old-piha-swimmer-missing-after-getting-into-difficulty/6LJXLL4OXBBODF6M3ITZTMWOVA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-suspend-search-for-37-year-old-piha-swimmer-missing-after-getting-into-difficulty/6LJXLL4OXBBODF6M3ITZTMWOVA/ The search included the police vessel Deodar and the Eagle helicopter. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 07:12:14 +0000 The search for the missing swimmer included the police vessel Deodar and the Eagle helicopter, alongside Surf Life Saving New Zealand (SLSNZ) and the Coastguard. Photo / Michael Cunningham
Dunedin activist Alex Foulkes eyes Greens’ co-leader role https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dunedin-activist-alex-foulkes-eyes-greens-co-leader-role/ZFJRZ2LU4BGVFICJ5QP5STD6WM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dunedin-activist-alex-foulkes-eyes-greens-co-leader-role/ZFJRZ2LU4BGVFICJ5QP5STD6WM/ Alex Foulkes' manifesto includes changing Te Tiriti o Waitangi to abolish the monarchy. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 07:06:53 +0000 Alex Foulkes is standing on a radical manifesto for the co-leadership of the Green Party.
Auckland’s Krishna Holi event traffic chaos: cars queue for hours in Kumeū https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/aucklands-krishna-holi-event-traffic-chaos-cars-queue-for-hours-in-kumeu/PJPKEOB4WRDBHA3GNC7FFR6E3Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/aucklands-krishna-holi-event-traffic-chaos-cars-queue-for-hours-in-kumeu/PJPKEOB4WRDBHA3GNC7FFR6E3Q/ Thousands attended Holi, the festival of colours, in Kumeū. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 05:59:30 +0000 Thousands attended the Krishna Holi Festival of Colours at the Hare Krishna Centre in Riverhead.
Hawke’s Bay golfer Mike Trass wins his first national title https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-golfer-mike-trass-wins-his-first-national-title/BLN6EGUPQRCANJNIKL73GOHWVA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/hawkes-bay-golfer-mike-trass-wins-his-first-national-title/BLN6EGUPQRCANJNIKL73GOHWVA/ Trass conquered a record 240-player field - 75 golf clubs and seven countries. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 04:17:33 +0000 A par up the last was good enough for Hastings club champion Mike Trass to add a New Zealand Seniors Championship title to his mantelpiece. Photo / Golf NZ

Auckland real estate agent charges $450 move in cost, including bond, for car park https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-real-estate-agent-charges-450-move-in-cost-for-a-car-park/Q4SE5VDNJZAFBCESIK656EVVSM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-real-estate-agent-charges-450-move-in-cost-for-a-car-park/Q4SE5VDNJZAFBCESIK656EVVSM/ Jaime LythA real estate agent has surprised people by charging move-in costs for a car park. Cyclone Gabrielle: PM Christopher Luxon in Puketapu, announces $63m funding for silt, debris removal https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/pm-christopher-luxon-in-puketapu-announces-63-million-funding-for-cyclone-gabrielle-silt-and-debris-删除/IOFFVGWRURCDFJ4J2GWIX244YM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/pm-christopher-luxon-in-puketapu-announces-63-million-funding-for-cyclone-gabrielle-silt-and-debris-删除/IOFFVGWRURCDFJ4J2GWIX244YM/ Urgent work to clean up cyclone-affected regions will continue, thanks to a $63m boost. Sun, 11 Feb 2024 01:33:30 +0000 Christopher Luxon arriving at a Puketapu farm with Minister for Emergency Management and Recovery Mark Mitchell on Sunday to announce $63m of silt and debris removal funding in cyclone-hit areas. Photo / Connull Lang
